name: Maj'aj'kij
culture_notes: Coastal Tongue dialect with Riveric loanwords
strong ancestor veneration at household shrines
diet heavy on smoked fish and kelp-ferments
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind-influence or instant resurrection
notes: small, remote harbor; navigational auguries used alongside charts
population unknown; strategic as supply point rather than production hub
